title: AGRICULTURAL EDUCATION(DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes in English Language and any three (3) of

 

1. Agricultural Science

2. Mathematics

3. Chemistry

4. Biology

5. Health Science

6. Integrated/Rural Science

7. Physics

8. Nature Study and

9. General Science.

 

NB

GROUP A:

1. Agricultural Science

2. Biology

3. Nutrition

4. Health Science.

5. Applied Biology

 

GROUP B:

1. Physics

2. Chemistry

3. Mathematics

4.Basic Mathematics/Arithmetic Process

5. Economics

6. Geography

7. Social Studies

8. Integrated Science

9. General Science
subjects: Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Biology/General Science or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGY/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.

title: BIOLOGY/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes, in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Biology and any other Science subject.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes or TC II merits in English Language and any three (3) of:

1. Economics

2. Accounts

3. Government

4. Geography

5. History

6. Business Method

7. Statistics

8. Commerce

9. Any Science subjects

 

NB: GROUP A:

Commercial Arithmetic Costing, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping Mathematics, Statistics.

 

GROUP B:

Office Practice, Business Method, Commerce, Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

title: CHEMISTRY/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Biology, Physics, General Science/Mathematics.

title: ENGLISH/CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English Language and Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/FRENCH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, French, Literature in English and any other Arts subjects.
subjects: French, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/HAUSA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics,  Hausa, Literature in English and any other Arts  subject.
subjects: Literature in English and any other Arts subject

title: ENGLISH/HISTORY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, History/Government and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Literature in English, History/Government and any other Arts subject

title: ENGLISH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Geography/Social Studies.
subjects: Literature in English and any of Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Chemistry and any other Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE / MATHEMATICS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the following

1. Biology/Agricultural Science

2. Chemistry

3. Physics and

4. General Science
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of: Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics Physics and any two (2) Science subjects
subjects: Physics and any other  two (2) Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology/Physics.

title: MATHEMATICS/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any other Social Science/Science subject.

title: MATHEMATICS/GEOGRAPHY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) of Science/Social Sciences.
subjects: Mathematics, Geography and any other Science/Social Science subject.

title: MATHEMATICS/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credits including English Language.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History and two (2) of Social Science subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other two (2) of Economics/Commerce, Government/History, Government/Social Studies.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any other of History/Government, Geography, Social Studies, Economics/Commerce.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government/History and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, History/Government and any other Social Science subject.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/GEOGRAPHY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and two (2) of Government/History, Christian Religious Studies/Christian Religious Studies, Economics.
subjects: Geography and two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/HAUSA
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Hausa and any two (2) of

1. Geography

2. History/Government

3. Islamic Studies/Christian Religious Studies

4. Economics
subjects: Hausa and any other two (2) Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/HISTORY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, History and any two (2) of Geography, Government, Economics and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.
subjects: History and any one (1)  Arts and one (1)  Social Science subject.
